desc: Slick Rod is a unique fishing rod (fishing gear) protectant that is made from a non-toxic flexible ceramic coating designed to protect rods and reels from UV damage, heat, oxidation, and corrosion; repelling salt, scales, dirt, and grime, whatever the water may throw at you from building up on your fishing equipment.

layout.text: Give your rod the "Extra Layer of Protection" that it deserves! Your "Rod" travels with you!!!
